TAX.name: Transfer Accumulator to X
TAX.description: Copies the current contents of the accumulator into the X Register and sets the zero and negative flags as appropriate.

TAY.name: Transfer Accumulator to Y
TAY.description: Copies the current contents of the accumulator into the Y Register and sets the zero and negative flags as appropriate.

TXA.name: Transfer X to Accumulator
TXA.description: Copies the current contents of the X Register into the Accumulator and sets the zero and negative flags as appropriate.

TAX.name: Transfer Y to Accumulator
TAX.description: Copies the current contents of the accumulator into the Y Register and sets the zero and negative flags as appropriate.
